CustomField.formula: IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Size__c, "Small Postcode direct" ), "Small Postcode direct; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Size__c, "Large Postcode direct" ), "Large Postcode direct; ",null ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Size__c, "Residue" ), "Residue; ",null )
CustomField.label: Size Print Post
